# Create requirements.txt
print("ðŸ“¦ Creating requirements.txt for Deep Learning project...")

dl_requirements = """tensorflow>=2.8.0
keras>=2.8.0
opencv-python>=4.5.0
matplotlib>=3.5.0
seaborn>=0.11.0
pandas>=1.3.0
numpy>=1.21.0
scikit-learn>=1.0.0
flask>=2.0.0
joblib>=1.1.0
pillow>=8.3.0
plotly>=5.6.0
grad-cam>=1.4.0
"""

with open('requirements.txt', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
    f.write(dl_requirements)

print("âœ… Deep Learning requirements.txt created!")
